Articles.Content:
My question is very simple, which button on EVA is for placing flags

Does i need specific part?
Right click a Kerbal that's on EVA. Click "Plant flag" on the context menu.

Right click a Kerbal that's on EVA. Click "Plant flag" on the context menu.

Thanks very much
My pleasure! Took me a bit of clicking around to find it the first time.

On a similar note, how do you get the kerbalnaut to place the flag facing a certain direction? There doesn't seem to be any rhyme or reason when he plants a flag. He'll pivot anywhere in a 180 degree arc from the position he's facing, which is the direction I wanted, and plant it in a completely different direction.
That's an excellent question, as I've seen them turn unexpectedly before planting the flag a number of times.

I think - no guarantee here - that they are always planted in the same direction, I noticed this on Kerbin. Not sure if its a specific compass heading or actually pointing at a spot, but regardless of which way you start facing they do always seem to point the same way.

Hmm, I don't think they always point to the same direction... or at least not in the Mun. I usually just keep taking the flag down, turn a bit, and place it down again until I have the angle I want

I haven't tried planting more than 1 flag on Kerbin, so I can't say that it is true there.

It seems to me that they'll pivot 90 degrees from the direction that they're facing. I solved this on the Mun by figuring out the pattern and moving my verbal appropriately. They seem to pivot counter-clockwise.
They don't always go the same direction. I don't know how the direction IS chosen, but I had a guy place two, and they were pointing different directions.
